app.name: Whisper Transcription Enhanced
app.description: Whisper transcription with custom VAD injection

args.device: Device to run the model on (cpu, cuda, auto)
args.audio_extensions: Comma-separated list of audio file extensions to process
args.subtitle_formats: Comma-separated list of subtitle formats (lrc, srt, vtt, txt)
args.min_speech_duration: Override minimum speech duration in ms
args.min_silence_duration: Override minimum silence duration in ms

info.model_precision: Model running with precision: {precision} on device: {device}

warnings.drag_files: Please drag files or directories to translate onto this program
warnings.failed_load_vad: Failed to load VAD metadata from {path}: {error}
warnings.vad_file_not_found: VAD metadata file not found at {path}
warnings.compute_types_unavailable: Could not get supported compute types for {device}: {error}
warnings.no_preferred_compute_type: No preferred compute type found, using default '{default}'

debug.skipped_suffix: Skipped - suffix '{suffix}' not in valid audio formats
debug.skipped_all_exist: Skipped - all subtitle formats already exist

vad.onnx_not_installed:
onnxruntime not installed. Install with:
  pip install onnxruntime      # For CPU
  pip install onnxruntime-gpu  # For GPU
vad.transformers_not_installed:
transformers not installed. Install with:
  pip install transformers
vad.auto_configured: Auto-configured ONNX to use {threads} CPU threads (half of {total} available)
vad.librosa_not_installed: librosa not installed, assuming audio is already at 16kHz
vad.completed: VAD processing completed: {chunks} chunks processed on {device}
vad.path_invalid: ONNX model path not provided or doesn't exist: {path}
vad.not_initialized: WhisperVadModel: ONNX model not initialized. Please provide a valid ONNX model path.

speech_segments.one: Found {count} speech segment using Whisper VAD
speech_segments.other: Found {count} speech segments using Whisper VAD

vad.registered: Registered whisper_vad model with progress callback

injection.not_active: VAD injection not active, nothing to uninject
